text: Dextrinodontia is a fungal genus in the family Hydnodontaceae. The genus is monotypic, containing the single species Dextrinodontia molliuscula, found in Tanzania. ==References== Category:Trechisporales Category:Fungi of Africa Category:Monotypic Basidiomycota genera Category:Trechisporales genera
title: Dextrinodontia
